      • getAllProperties

        public java.util.ArrayList<Property> getAllProperties​(int game_id)
        creates gameproperties in the database and Property objects for the game.
        Parameters:
        game_id - the id of the current game
        Returns:
        ArrayList with all the Properties
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getPropertiesByOwner

        public java.util.ArrayList<Property> getPropertiesByOwner​(int gameId,
                                                          java.lang.String username)
        gets gameproperties from the database and generates Property objects related to the parameter username.
        Parameters:
        gameId - the game_id the id of the current game
        username - the username of the player whose properties are returned
        Returns:
        ArrayList of properties owned by the player
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateProperty

                           int game_id)
        updates the property in the database
        Parameters:
        prop - the property that is updated
        game_id - the id of the current game
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • endGame

      • getColorSet

        public java.util.ArrayList<Property> getColorSet​(int gameId,
                                                 java.lang.String colorHex)
        deletes all gameProperties for the given game_id
        Parameters:
        gameId - the id of the current game
        colorHex - the hexCode of the color
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Properties of the given color
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
